pages.text: Yes, the base version of Create has its own food items. YES they are good. Addon foods for Create will be located in another entry.
Hard to automate, but provides haste and saturation.$(br2)It is created with the following ingredients in a $(6)heated$() basin mixer setup: $(li)1 Leaf Block $(li)250mB of Water $(li)250mB of Milk
Simply use a Spout to pour honey onto an apple, it is as simple as that. You should be excited to automate a honey farm using Create's fluid pipes!
Use a Spout to pour milk onto bread. Enjoy your sweet bread roll!

Easier to automate than Builder's Tea, but does not provide any buffs or cause a sugar rush. $(br2)Mix the following ingredients in a $(6)heated$() basin mixer setup: $(li)1 Sugar $(li)1 bunch of Cocoa Beans $(li)250mB of Milk
Use a Spout to pour chocolate onto regular berries. Enjoy!
